meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny, folks! Welcome back to my humble abode of gaming critique, where the only thing more plentiful than my sarcasm is my love for great games!

Now, let's dive into the Wild West with Red Dead Redemption 2 (RDR2), a game that has earned the perfect score from just about every critic out there. And I'm here to join the chorus of praise... while still poking fun at myself and those fancy-pants critics.

In all seriousness, RDR2 is an absolute masterpiece that will leave you in awe of its sheer scale, attention to detail, and mastery of storytelling. Rockstar Games has outdone themselves with this one, folks! The game's open world is a technological marvel, filled with an incredible amount of depth and breadth that will keep you exploring for hours on end.

But let's get back to those critics who gave it a perfect score. I mean, I'm not saying they're wrong (although, I do love a good underdog story). IGN called it "a game of rare quality," while Game Informer praised its "compelling companion story" and "technical triumph." Cheat Code Central went all artistic on us, calling RDR2 "evidence for the argument that games are art."

And then there's Vandal, who simply stated that RDRII is a masterpiece – which, let's be real, is basically equivalent to saying it's the best thing since sliced bread. Game Revolution echoed similar sentiments, praising its high level of craftsmanship and the fact that everything feels polished and well-done. SpazioGames called it "the new North Star for Open-world games," while COGconnected gushed about its phenomenal narrative and groundbreaking gameplay.

Now, I'm not gonna lie – I'm a little jealous that these critics got to experience RDR2 before me (I mean, who wouldn't want to explore the Wild West?). But in all seriousness, this game is truly special, and if you haven't played it yet... well, what are you even doing with your life?

So, there you have it – my take on Red Dead Redemption 2. It's a must-play, folks! Even I couldn't help but be impressed by its sheer scale and majesty.

And that's it for today, Hippo Penny fans! Thanks for joining me on this wild ride, and don't forget to subscribe for more gaming goodness!
